# GCInputLeftPaddle

**Global Variable**

The name for the left paddle input.

## Declaration

```swift
var GCInputLeftPaddle: String { get }
```

## Left and right paddles

- **GCInputRightPaddle**: The name for the right paddle input.

items.description: The name for the right paddle input.
